title: Bari-Bari
tech: Unity | C# | Adobe Photoshop - Jun 2022 - Oct 2022
description:
An action-packed mobile game that incorporates and explores Filipino culture, folklore, and urban legends into its design and mechanics. 
 I was the lead programmer, responsible for coding game functionalities and mechanics. Additionally, I worked as a project manager, delegating tasks and organizing schedules. I also contributed to planning and developing the project idea and assets. Furthermore, I tested the game to enhance user experience and to resolve any errors and bugs found.

title: Dugong the Ruined Homeland
tech: Unity | C# | Adobe Photoshop - Jun 2022 - Mar 2023
description:
An engaging mobile game that promotes environmental advocacy by featuring endangered marine animals and polluted marine territories in the Philippines. 
 I served as the lead programmer, overseeing the coding of game functionalities and mechanics. My responsibilities included assigning tasks to team members, managing schedules, and participating in the planning and development of the project concept. I also took part in crafting the project's research document. Additionally, I conducted thorough testing of the game to improve user experience and addressed any identified errors and bugs.

title: SpellWell!
description:
SpellWell is a children's game where they fill in missing letters to improve vocabulary and spelling. 
 I programmed, designed, and conducted thorough testing of the game to enhance the user experience and fix any identified errors and bugs.
